title: Adani Green Energy to see 30 pc CAGR capacity growth
description: Adani Green Energy Ltd (AGEL) was projected to achieve over 30 per cent annual growth rate in renewable energy capacity, targeting over 50 GW by 2030. The firm aims to add 6-7 GW annually and improve capacity utilization to boost power sales growth by 35%. AGEL's expansion strategy included key assets in Rajasthan and the Khavda site.
